noun.description: A small swelling or aggregation of cells in the body, especially an abnormal one.
examples: the area feels firm but has irregular nodules which can be painful to touch
laparotomy showed white nodules in the liver

noun.description: A small rounded lump of matter distinct from its surroundings, for example, of flint in chalk, carbon in cast iron, or a mineral on the seabed.
examples: in the coal pits nodules of iron ore were mined

origin: Late Middle English: from Latin nodulus, diminutive of nodus knot.
